title: Webinar 1. HTML. The Foundations of Web Design
description: This session introduces the core principles of web page structure using HTML. Participants will learn how to build clean, well-organized documents, utilize semantic HTML5 elements, and understand the importance of accessible and meaningful markup.
speaker: Alexandr Lyssenko

title: Webinar 2. CSS and Preprocessors
description: This session covers the fundamentals of web page styling with CSS, focusing on modern layout techniques and the use of preprocessors for scalable, maintainable stylesheets. Participants will explore how to control page appearance, implement responsive designs, and streamline their workflow with CSS preprocessors.
keyTopics: Flexbox and CSS Grid for responsive design
Nesting, mixins, and variables in preprocessors
speaker: Kateryna Khovrich

title: Webinar 3. JavaScript Fundamentals. Dynamic Web Development
description: This session covers the essential concepts of JavaScript, the scripting language used to build dynamic, interactive web pages. Participants will explore the language syntax, data types, functions, and control structures. Emphasis will be placed on working with the DOM (Document Object Model) and manipulating web page elements programmatically.
keyTopics: JavaScript variables, data types, and operators
speaker: Ratan Singh

title: Webinar 4. Typescript. Fundamentals
description: In this session, participants will learn how TypeScript builds on JavaScript by adding a type system that catches mistakes before you hit runtime. They’ll start with essential basics - basic types, inference, and strict checking - then move into more advanced topics. Along the way they’ll explore type guards, generics, and the powerful utility types that make your code clearer, safer, and more maintainable
keyTopics: Core types & inference (literal types, any, annotations)
Object shapes & collections (interfaces, type aliases, tuples)
Union & intersection types plus type guards
Generics & utility types (built-in helpers for transforming types)
speaker: Alexey Mikosha
